text: nan vittu vanta a(nta ulakat)til (ini) nalla kariyankalaiye nan ceytu kontiruppen'' enru kuruvan. (Eninum,) atu akakkutiya kariyamanru. (Ittakaiya cantarppankalil) avan kurakkutiyatu verum varttaiye (tavira verillai). Avarkalukku mun or aran erpattu vitum. (Uyir kotuttu) eluppappatum nal varai atil tankivituvarkal
